text: Distribution over the town as a whole varies, the smaller towns tending to rely mainly ones providing neighbourhood centres of up to thirty or more shops at the heart of the residential areas, as well as small sub-centres in outlying districts.
handwritten_text: Distribution over the town as a whole varies, the smaller towns tending to rely mainly ones providing neighbourhood centres of up to thirty or more shops at the heart of the residential areas, as well as small sub-centres in outlying districts.
